description: This file defines a custom Flutter theme class 'OceanTheme' providing a tailored ThemeData with specific color palette, component styles (cards, input fields, buttons, app bar), and text themes for a modern, blue-and-amber accented UI.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing a custom 'Ocean' themed Flutter ThemeData, including color scheme, component styles, and text styles suited for a modern app aesthetic.

methods.name: oceanTheme
methods.description: A static getter that returns a configured ThemeData object with the 'Ocean' theme.
